EmailTemplate.name: LE-03-14-202203-HHS-ENT-SEVT-HIMSS22.Post Event No Booth Scan
EmailTemplate.subject: We hope you enjoyed HIMSS22
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
VIRTUAL CARE What’s next in the world of care delivery? We were truly energized by our experience at HIMSS22 in Orlando and hope you were, too. It’s an exciting time for virtual care solutions and Teladoc Health is proud to offer hospitals and health systems a full spectrum of services powered by technology and data to improve health at scale. We strive to deliver high-quality care for every clinical setting and use case, including:
- High-acuity care like stroke and emergent solutions - Personalized solutions for chronic care management - Inpatient solutions that create patient care efficiencies - Unified, integrated virtual care platform powered by Solo with Microsoft Teams
Learn more about the Teladoc Health vision <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/resources/video/vision/]]> About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
